resources.string:
" KnowToGrow is one stop
" " destination for all career related
" " queries. Students can use KnowToGrow
" "find their ideal career path and embark on a
" "sucessful and fulfilling career. Our AI based
" "approach helps students to find their ideal
" "career choice in which they have maximum
" "potential to excel based on their personality.
" " Our expert counsellors help students as
" " well as parents personalise their
" " KnowToGrow experience.
" "
